summary: This mod is a retexture of the Demon Hunter Armor created by jmenaru. This retexture has three colors: Purple, (which is the original), White and Black.  This retexture requires you to download the original Demon Hunter Armor mod first.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/2yxn061.jpg[/img]

[center]This mod is a retexture of the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060]Demon Hunter Armor[/url] created by jmenaru. This retexture has three colors: Purple, (which is the original), White and Black. This retexture requires you to download the original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060]Demon Hunter Armor[/url] mod first.

The black and white versions are [b][i]not[/i][/b] recommended. (The breastplate looks very awkward in both versions.) They were just included for the people who don't enjoy purple and like white/black.[/center]


[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/28vda4h.png[/img]

[i]Nothing yet![/i]


[img]http://oi39.tinypic.com/2mmfxww.jpg[/img]
[LIST]
[*]First, and most importantly, you [b][i]MUST[/i][/b] download the original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060]Demon Hunter Armor[/url] mod. [/*]
[*]Download one of the three files with the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager.[/url] Then you're done![/*]
[/LIST]
[b]If you choose to manually install the mod...[/b]
[LIST]
[*]Download the original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060]Demon Hunter Armor[/url] mod. (Instructions to download this available on mod page)[/*]
[*]Download one of my three files and extract the archive.[/*]
[*]Paste the Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim[/*]
[/LIST]

[img]http://oi39.tinypic.com/n4e9ll.jpg[/img]
[LIST]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1924379/]TairenSoul[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6553681/]Caelrya[/url] for their [i]astonishing[/i] images.[/*]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/26505/?]Earrindo[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4184206/?]Urshi[/url] for their critique.[/*]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2509011/?]jmenaru[/url] for creating the armor and being kind enough to give me permission to upload this.[/*]
[*]Bethesda for everything.[/*]
[/LIST]

Please leave feedback in the comments sections!
I hope you like this retexture! If this gets popular, I'll make more retextures.
Have fun!
author: Stealthic

files.name: Demon Hunter Armor Retextured - UNP and CBBEv3
